QuestData.Title: A Special Stone
QuestData.Description:
Tidemistress Nazesh is right up this hill, $n.
There is something there. Something Azshara wants very badly.
The naga must not succeed. If you can get a little piece of that stone, though, bring it back for us.
Take this scroll with you, it will help you in your fight.
It is time we push her forces, back into the waves for good.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Tidemistress Nazesh and discover why the naga were sent here.
